HOW-TO:

1) mount images with alcohol120%

2) set virtual drive letter to D !!

3) install

4) copy "Clusters", "Music", "SmacksHi" and "Speech" of both images to installation folder

5) rename "speech.clu" according to image to "speech1.clu" and "speech2.clu"

6) add game folder to scummvm (google it if you dont know it yet)

7) profit
